ToastMaker - Class in ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.share
Gives the possibility to print a Toast from an asynchronous task Use it like this: BaseActivity activity = (BaseActivity) context; activity.runOnUiThread(new ToastMaker(request.toString(), activity));
